scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-mjs && npm run copy-components && npm run compile
scripts.clean: rm -f tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && rm -f src/**/*.js && rm -f src/**/*.d.ts && rm -f src/**/*.map
scripts.copy-mjs:
cd dist && echo "require = require('esm')(module)
module.exports = require('./index.js')" > index.cjs
scripts.copy-components: cd src && find . | grep \.svelte$ | awk '{print "mkdir -p dirname "$1" && cp -f "$1" ../dist/"$1}'
